text: The Doll with Millions () is a 1928 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Sergei Komarov.ВкратцеКУКЛА С МИЛЛИОНАМИ It stars Igor Ilyinsky, Vladimir Fogel, and Galina Kravchenko. ==Actors== *Igor Ilyinsky as Pierre Cuisinai *Vladimir Fogel as Paul Cuisinai *Galina Kravchenko as Blanche *Ada Vojtsik as Maria Ivanova *Vladimir Chuvelyov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1928 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Komarov Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Doll with Millions
